summary: Continued Phase 2 of expansion_decreases_measure theorem. Added 6 proven complexity lemmas, totalComplexity definition, and applyRule_decreases_complexity theorem. Improved proof structure for both linear and branching cases with proper extraction of sf membership and non-expanded status. 4 sorries remain requiring tedious but straightforward case analysis. Phases 3-4 remain blocked by missing FMP-tableau infrastructure.

Updated implementation summary with session 3 progress
